ghostPost.title: Isn't a blockchain's Proof Of Work algorithm terrible for the environment?
ghostPost.excerpt:
The entire world agrees that blockchain needs to evolve beyond Proof Of Work.
 As soon as new solutions are available, we are committed to adopting new
blockchain infrastructure and leaving behind Proof Of Work.
